title: Bans my account
body: I don't know why my account bans up top 2100 !! Help me please !

replies.body: A ban note like that typically means that someone was in the process of hacking your account. This was most likely a type of protective suspension to make sure you are the only one who has access, so hit up our account recovery experts in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can get the recovery process started!
thank you ! I sent a ticket to them ! How often will it be resolved?
